title: HomeHabit

container.value: 2010 El Camino Real #1180, Santa Clara, CA 95050

creator: Habit Automated LLC
descriptionHtml:
HomeHabit is a smart home dashboard that allows you to integrate and control many popular smart home platforms and devices.

FEATURES
• Custom dashboards
• 30 different widget types
• Screensavers
• Custom themes
• Labs features

INTEGRATIONS
• Home Assistant
• OpenHAB
• Domoticz
• Hubitat (experimental)
• Vera (experimental)
• Met.no
• Sunrise Sunset
• Local images
• Photo of the Day

INTEGRATIONS (PREMIUM PLUS)
• Govee
• LIFX
• Airthings (coming soon)
• Awair (coming soon)
• Meteo-France
• AirVisual
• AccuWeather (coming soon)
• OpenWeatherMap (coming soon)
• IFTTT Webhooks

Integrations have various levels of setup difficulty. Some might require setting up an account to receive an API key.

If you are experiencing any problems during the app setup or while connecting to your integrations, please send us a message to support@homehabit.app

HomeHabit is a smart home dashboard that allows you to integrate and control many popular smart home platforms and devices.

FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS

Custom Dashboards
Create personal dashboards with custom layout and 30 different widget types.

Easy Integrations
Quickly integrate with variety of platforms, services, and devices.

Personalization
Use themes to create a unique style for your dashboard.

Privacy
Keep your data private and local to this device. No need for another online account.

SUPPORTED INTEGRATIONS

Basic & Premium
• Home Assistant
• OpenHAB
• Domoticz
• MQTT
• Hubitat (experimental)
• Vera (experimental)
• Met.no
• Sunrise Sunset
• MJPEG
• RTSP
• HTTP
• RSS
• Local images
• Photo of the Day

Premium Plus
• August
• Govee
• LIFX
• SwitchBot
• Tile
• TP-Link Kasa
• Wyze
• Yeelight
• Foscam
• Reolink
• Airthings
• Awair
• Meteo-France
• AirVisual
• AccuWeather
• OpenWeatherMap
• IFTTT Webhooks
• And more

Integrations have various levels of setup difficulty. Some might require setting up an account to receive an API key.

If you are experiencing any problems during the app setup or while connecting to your integrations, please send us a message to support@homehabit.app
descriptionShort: HomeHabit is a smart home dashboard that integrates with many smart home devices

appDetails.developerAddress: 2010 El Camino Real #1180, Santa Clara, CA 95050
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 26.0:
• feature: Users - support for multiple users with various permissions
• feature: Auto-lock configuration
• feature: Dashboard user permissions (view, control, edit)

• feature: Countdown widget
• feature: New rule actions - show/hide camera stream, select dashboard
• fix: Intermittent issues re-authenticating Awair, Netatmo, Withings integrations
